HTML规范

代码DEMO

<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
<head>
<title></title>
<script type="text/javascript" main="script.js" src="common.js?load=png"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="style.css" />
</head>
<body>
	<header id="top">
	</header>
	<section id="main">
		<section id="block">
			<div class="block-title"></div>
			<div class="block-content">
				<div class="lottery">
					<div class="lottery-prizes"></div>
					<a class="lottery-button"></a>
				</div>
			</div>
		</section>
	</section>
	<footer id="bottom">
	</footer>
	//弹窗
	<div id="dialog-demo" class="dialog pngCss">
		<a href="javascript:;" class="cls pngCss rotate"></a>
		<div class="dialog-body">
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</body>

命名规范

HTML代码、CSS选择器、切图图片名 统一!!
